DOC.detailed_description: In prospective cohort study , obese child recruit . After informed consent obtain , child complete standardize sleep questionnaire pediatric daily sleepiness scale questionnaire . All participant undergo complete physical examination , blood test lipid profile , liver enzymes , Glucose insulin obtain , liver sonography perform assess presence fatty liver . Nasopharyngeal radiograph use assess adenoidal size base method Cohen Konak . A standard in-laboratory , overnight polysomnography perform , within 2 week enrollment study , sleep laboratory Asaf Harofeh Medical Center . Children severe obstructive sleep apnea , define apnea hypopnea index ( AHI ) > 15 undergo adenotonsillectomy . All child refer dietary physical education program . The first visit dietician consider day 1 study . Children follow monthly dietician . After three month follow-up , subject divide two group . Group 1 include child AHI > 2 initial polysomnography ( include child underwent adenotonsillectomy AHI > 15 ) , group 2 consist child AHI < 2 initial PSG . Children group 2 continue monthly dietary visit . Children group 1 undergo second evaluation include questionnaire , laboratory blood test , liver sonography , nasopharyngeal radiograph , polysomnography . Children demonstrate reduction AHI base PSG offer continue dietary treatment alone . Children change AHI base PSG offer undergo adenotonsillectomy addition continue dietary management . All child follow total duration six month . After six month , child re-evaluated questionnaire , blood test , liver sonography , nasopharyngeal radiograph . Polysomnography perform child AHI > 2 second PSG .
